attributes.action: Get Burton on Trents "Ferry Bridge" policed after 6pm to help protect the public
attributes.additional_details:
Last night A 30 year old man got attacked by a gang of people just by walking over to meet his friends in town. 

It's intimidating when having to go home at night because of the people that hang about down there. People are having to be constantly checking over there shoulders because off someone following them so it's time to protect the public from incidents like this in the future
attributes.background: Just lately a lot of people have been getting attacked on the bridge/the dingle and it's about time someone did something about it
